message: First sentence of Javadoc is incomplete (period is missing) or not present.
Abbreviation in name 'OWLOntologyImplementationFactory' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
'method def modifier' has incorrect indentation level 4, expected level should be 2.
Abbreviation in name 'createOWLOntology' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'ontologyID' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
